PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hour of the Wolf
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, if there are no targetable enemies, purge 'Untargetable' effects from all enemies and give those that had those effects 2 Protection and Stagger Protection instead.

PassiveDesc.Name: Time for Round Two
PassiveDesc.Desc: When HP drops to 1, fully recover HP and Stagger Resist, and purge all status ailments. HP cannot reach 0 before this occurs. (Once per Act) Afterwards, gain 2 Strength and Endurance for the rest of the Act.
